forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy frost after 4am. Clear, with a low around 34. Northwest wind around 8 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy frost before 9am. Sunny, with a high near 51. North wind around 7 mph.

weather_report:
As the night drapes Boston in its gentle embrace, an early chill whispers through the air, presaging the frost that will greet those awake in the tranquil hours before dawn. Expect clear and cool conditions, with the temperature slipping to a modest low of around 34 degrees. With a gentle northwest breeze stirring, it will be wise to wrap oneself in layers, donning a cozy scarf and a warm hat to fend off the inviting bite of the frost that invites nostalgia while stargazing over the city’s luminous skyline.

The promise of a crisp autumn day lies ahead, where the sun will rise to cast its glow on the splendid hues of fall foliage. With a high nearing fifty-one, the sky adorned by sunny blue will serve as a perfect companion for a leisurely stroll through the quiet streets or a moment spent with a warm cup of coffee, watching the world awaken. Activities could include visiting a nearby bookstore—perhaps diving into the pages of a long-ignored novel—or enjoying the reflective stillness of the waterfront, where the sparkling waters mirror the tranquil sky. Engage in these simple pleasures, relishing the day's tranquil beauty while embracing the sharp, invigorating air.
